name: King's Dungeon
summary: King's Dungeon was released in December 1992 by Soft Plan. In King's Dungeon, you play as a Dark Lord who defends his castle against invading heroes. You summon minions and traps to attempt to defeat the heroes. Each hero slaying grants you experience, which helps unlock new things to summon. There is a total of 40 levels.
